directions: Toss the romaine lettuce, blueberries, dried cranberries, sunflower seeds, walnut pieces, feta cheese, and goat cheese in a large bowl. Pour the vinegar, syrup, and grapeseed oil over the salad one at a time; toss until evenly coated. Season with salt.
ingredients: 1/4 cup white balsamic vinegar, or to taste
1/4 cup maple syrup, or to taste
1/4 cup grapeseed oil, or to taste
title: Deliciously Sweet Salad with Maple, Nuts, Seeds, Blueberries, and Goat Cheese
